SEARCH
Package controller.interfaces

Interface IAppointmentManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
AppointmentManager
public interface IAppointmentManager
This interface provides methods to manage appointments in the system.
Since:
2024-11-16

  • Method Details

    • updateAppointment

      void updateAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Updates the appointment in the repository.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to update.

    • scheduleAppointment

      void scheduleAppointment(AppointmentSlot slot, Patient patient)
      Creates an appointment request, for doctor approval.
      Parameters:
      slot - the appointment slot to schedule the appointment.
      patient - the patient to schedule the appointment for.

    • cancelAppointment

      void cancelAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Cancels a scheduled appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to cancel.

    • rescheduleAppointment

      void rescheduleAppointment(Appointment initialAppointment, AppointmentSlot newSlot)
      Reschedules an appointment to a new appointment slot.
      Parameters:
      initialAppointment - the initial appointment to reschedule.
      newSlot - the new appointment slot.

    • acceptAppointment

      void acceptAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Accepts a requested appointment, marking it as scheduled.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to accept.

    • declineAppointment

      void declineAppointment(Appointment appointment)
      Declines a requested appointment, marking it as cancelled.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to decline.

    • updateAppointmentOutcome

      AppointmentOutcomeRecord updateAppointmentOutcome(Appointment appointment, String consultationNotes, List<Prescription> prescriptions, List<MedicalService> services)
      Update the outcome of an appointment.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to update the outcome for.
      consultationNotes - the consultation notes.
      prescriptions - the prescriptions.
      services - the medical services.
      Returns:
      the outcome record of the appointment.

    • getAvailableSlotsByDoctor

      List<AppointmentSlot> getAvailableSlotsByDoctor(LocalDate date, Doctor doctor)
      Gets the available time slots for an appointment of a doctor on a given date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date to get the available slots for.
      doctor - the doctor.
      Returns:
      the list of available time slots.

      the list of appointments.

      the list of appointments.

      Returns:
      the list of appointments, ordered by most recent first.

    • getPendingAppointments

      Gets the upcoming pending appointments of a patient, that is pending doctor approval.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient to get the appointments for.
      Returns:
      the list of pending appointments, ordered by most recent first.

    • getUpcomingAppointments

      List<Appointment> getUpcomingAppointments(Patient patient)
      Gets upcoming appointments of a patient, that is either scheduled or requested, ordered by most recent first.
      Parameters:
      patient - the patient to get the appointments for.
      Returns:
      the list of appointments, ordered by most recent first.

    • getPendingAppointments

      List<Appointment> getPendingAppointments(Doctor doctor)
      Gets the upcoming pending appointments assigned to a doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctor - the doctor to get the appointments for.
      Returns:
      the list of pending appointments, ordered by most recent first.

      Returns:
      the list of completed appointments, ordered by most recent first.
